Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Amenmes with a blue lappet wig with yellow braided ends, a brown face, the front of the body is yellow, the collar is red, the hands are brown with blue bracelets and depicted holding two black hoes, the back is decorated with a representation of a red yoke with two vessels with handles and a seed basket which extends down the back(damaged), the front of the legs is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in six rows of black hieroglyphs separated by red lines, the feet are decorated with red, white and blue stripes.
Condition: fair - section missing from the back
